title: Harley-Davidson Men's Custom Freedom Fleece Pullover Crew Sweatshirt - Black
features: Harley-Davidson Men's Freedom Pullover Fleece Sweatshirt
Soft and comfortable, made from 50% cotton and 50% polyester
Front features our Wisconsin Harley-Davidson dealer screen printed graphic

description: Harley-Davidson Men's Freedom Pullover Fleece Sweatshirt, 30298998. This sweatshirt has all the appointments you want, the graphic details and the right cotton blend. Made of 50% cotton and 50% polyester, this pullover is a year round go-to garment for all your outdoor activities, on or off the bike. A Wisconsin Harley-Davidson Bar & Shield logo is placed on the left breast in a classic Harley orange. The best is saved for the backside with an awesome custom distressed eagle graphic with an iconic Bar & Shield logo and patriotic theme background. With rib-knit cuffs, you'll stay warm even in the coldest breeze. This is sure to be a sweatshirt that you'll wear time and time again. 30298998.
